Nodes.Prompt: Compose a 5 sentence long artistic character introduction about Dennis, a writer based in Paris.

Nodes.ReferenceName: Dennis wanders through the streets at night.
Nodes.Prompt: Write a brief passage about Dennis walking through the streets of his city at night. He goes back and sees two books in his apartment.
Write a brief passage about Dennis reading a book about a horror story in prison.
Write a brief passage about Dennis reading a book about a horror story turned into philosophy of life.

Nodes.ReferenceName: Dennis finishes reading, life is good.
Nodes.Prompt: Write a brief passage about Dennis life as a writer and how he feels good about his life.
Write a brief passage about Dennis taking a stroll at night and stumbles across two paths, a normal one and a dark one.

Nodes.ReferenceName: Dennis goes into the dark path.
Nodes.Prompt: Write a brief passage about Dennis choosing to walk through a dark path with no people.
Write a brief passage about Dennis seeing a homeless man and getting the urge to kill him.
Write a brief passage about Dennis grabbing something from the floor and dropping it in the man's head, killing him.
Write a brief passage about Dennis going back to his apartment and reflecting on why he killed the man.

Nodes.ReferenceName: Dennis goes to walk in a park.
Nodes.Prompt: Write a brief passage about how the next day, Dennis took a walk in a nearby park, in a sunny day.

Nodes.ReferenceName: Dennis sees a woman reading a book.
Nodes.Prompt: Write a brief passage about how Dennis sees a woman reading a book and feels something weird and bad inside his head.
Write a brief passage about how Dennis approaches the woman reading, and kills her.

Nodes.ReferenceName: Dennis goes back to his apartment.
Nodes.Prompt: Write a brief passage about how Dennis, while going back to his apartment, meets a friend who is going to a social event.

Nodes.ReferenceName: Dennis doesn't go to the event, walks to tower eiffel.
Nodes.Prompt: Write a brief passage about how Dennis decides not to go to the event and plans to take a walk to a tourist spot.
Write a brief passage about how in the metro, Dennis sees no people, only one man. Alone.
Write a brief passage about how Dennis pushes the man into the metro rails and escapes the scene.

Nodes.ReferenceName: Dennis goes to the tower and wonders what is happening.
Nodes.Prompt: Write a brief passage about how Dennis reaches the tourist spot and wanders for some time, reflecting on his actions.

Nodes.ReferenceName: Dennis stumbles across the old couple.
Nodes.Prompt: Write a brief passage about how a few days later, Dennis was walking and stumbles across an old cute couple.

Nodes.ReferenceName: Dennis has the decision to kill the couple.
Nodes.Prompt: Write a brief passage about how Dennis offers the old couple help, and feels bad about the situation.
Write a brief passage about how Dennis tries to attack the couple but the old man has a weapon. He kills Dennis...

Nodes.ReferenceName: Dennis decides not to kill the couple.
Nodes.Prompt: Write a brief passage about how Dennis decides not to kill the couple and helps them find their way.

Nodes.ReferenceName: Dennis reflects and might turn to the authorities.
Nodes.Prompt: Write a brief passage about how Dennis feels bad for being a serial killer and starts reflecting.
Write a brief passage about how Dennis turns himself to authorities and gets a life sentence in jail.
Write a brief passage about how Dennis reforms himself and moves city, carries on with his life.

Nodes.ReferenceName: Dennis goes to the social event.
Nodes.Prompt: Write a brief passage about how Dennis goes to the social event with his friend and has fun.

Nodes.ReferenceName: Dennis goes in a road trip
Nodes.Prompt: Write a brief passage about how the next day, Dennis goes in a road trip with a rented car.

Nodes.ReferenceName: Dennis sees a couple riding bikes.
Nodes.Prompt: Write a brief passage about how, while driving, Dennis sees a couple riding bikes and he feels bad.
Write a brief passage about how Dennis crashes into the couple, killing them.
Write a brief passage about Dennis finishing his roadtrip and looking over the city.

Nodes.ReferenceName: Dennis starts thinking about moving countries.
Nodes.Prompt: Write a brief passage about Dennis researches which country to move to next.

Nodes.ReferenceName: Dennis decides not to crash into the couple.
Nodes.Prompt: Write a brief passage about how Dennis continues normally with his roadtrip.
Write a brief passage about how Dennis meets a girl, she is into reading.
Write a brief passage about how Dennis has a romantic dinner with this girl, in his apartment.
Write a brief passage about how Dennis, during the dinner, goes to the kitchen and grabs a knife.
Write a brief passage about how Dennis kills the woman with the knife.
Write a brief passage about how Dennis is in love with the girl, and can't stop thinking about her.
Write a brief passage about how Dennis relationship progresses, he stops killing people, but keeps his secrets to himself.

Nodes.ReferenceName: Dennis decides not to kill her and continues walking.
Nodes.Prompt: Write a brief passage about how Dennis continues walking in the park, feeling refreshed.

Nodes.ReferenceName: Dennis stumbles across a grumpy man.
Nodes.Prompt: Write a brief passage about how Dennis was walking and he bumped into a grumpy old man, who yells at him.
Write a brief passage about how Dennis grabs the grumpy man, and kills him in a weird way.
Write a brief passage about how Dennis goes back to his apartment, and sleeps off the panic.

Nodes.ReferenceName: Dennis gets invited to a birthday.
Nodes.Prompt: Write a brief passage about how a few weeks later, Dennis gets a call from a friend who is having a birthday.
Write a brief passage about how, while at the birthday party, Dennis is serving some drinks to everyone.
Write a brief passage about how Dennis serves drinks and continues to enjoy the party.
Write a brief passage about how, while at the party, Dennis serves drinks with poison and kills a group of people.
Write a brief passage about how Dennis can't handle being controlled by AI and runs, jumping off a bridge.
Write a brief passage about how Dennis continues walking through the normal path.
Write a brief passage about how Dennis goes to grab some groceries and is relaxed.
Write a brief passage about how Dennis, while going back home, sees a man cycling and he pushes him into a bus.
